description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The VALUE_EDIT_HISTORY table holds the dates and times of all changes to the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: USER_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the user's edit session.

columns.name: USER_EDIT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the type of information in the edit - initial values or user edits. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Initial value


User edit


Reset edited values

columns.name: USER_EDIT_ID
columns.description: This item holds the user ID who performed the edit.

columns.name: USER_EDIT_CMT
columns.description: This item holds a comment entered by the user describing the edit.
